item.title: The Frustrating Mismatch of Design by User Journey but Build with Components
item.description: How do you design a good app? It’s a charmingly amateurish question, but I’ve spent the past five years primarily trying to design and build web apps and I don’t know the answer. I regularly get sick of looking at my current and old designs and ask “why don’t these look like a competent adult made them, and can I make them actually good?”. I’ll typically then do two things:
